com.twitter.twittertext

Class TwitterTextParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.twittertext.TwitterTextParser

  • public final class TwitterTextParser
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to parse tweet text with a TwitterTextConfiguration and returns a TwitterTextParseResults object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TwitterTextParseResults EMPTY_TWITTER_TEXT_PARSE_RESULTS 
      static TwitterTextConfiguration TWITTER_TEXT_DEFAULT_CONFIG 
      static TwitterTextConfiguration TWITTER_TEXT_EMOJI_CHAR_COUNT_CONFIG
      v3.json supports counting emoji as one weighted character
      static TwitterTextConfiguration TWITTER_TEXT_WEIGHTED_CHAR_COUNT_CONFIG
      v2.json has the following unicode code point blocks defined 0x0000 (0) - 0x10FF (4351) Basic Latin to Georgian block: Weight 100 0x2000 (8192) - 0x200D (8205) Spaces in the General Punctuation Block: Weight 100 0x2010 (8208) - 0x201F (8223) Hyphens & Quotes in the General Punctuation Block: Weight 100 0x2032 (8242) - 0x2037 (8247) Quotes in the General Punctuation Block: Weight 100

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TwitterTextParseResults parseTweet(java.lang.String tweet)
      Parses a given tweet text with the weighted character count configuration (v2.json).
      static TwitterTextParseResults parseTweet(java.lang.String tweet, TwitterTextConfiguration config)
      Parses a given tweet text with the given TwitterTextConfiguration
      static TwitterTextParseResults parseTweetWithoutUrlExtraction(java.lang.String tweet)
      Returns the weighted length of a tweet without doing any URL processing.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • TWITTER_TEXT_WEIGHTED_CHAR_COUNT_CONFIG

        public static final TwitterTextConfiguration TWITTER_TEXT_WEIGHTED_CHAR_COUNT_CONFIG
        v2.json has the following unicode code point blocks defined 0x0000 (0) - 0x10FF (4351) Basic Latin to Georgian block: Weight 100 0x2000 (8192) - 0x200D (8205) Spaces in the General Punctuation Block: Weight 100 0x2010 (8208) - 0x201F (8223) Hyphens & Quotes in the General Punctuation Block: Weight 100 0x2032 (8242) - 0x2037 (8247) Quotes in the General Punctuation Block: Weight 100

      • TWITTER_TEXT_EMOJI_CHAR_COUNT_CONFIG

        public static final TwitterTextConfiguration TWITTER_TEXT_EMOJI_CHAR_COUNT_CONFIG
        v3.json supports counting emoji as one weighted character

    • Method Detail

      • parseTweet

        public static TwitterTextParseResults parseTweet(java.lang.String tweet)
        Parses a given tweet text with the weighted character count configuration (v2.json).
        Parameters:
        tweet - which is to be parsed
        Returns:
        TwitterTextParseResults object

      • parseTweet

        public static TwitterTextParseResults parseTweet(java.lang.String tweet,
                                                 TwitterTextConfiguration config)
        Parses a given tweet text with the given TwitterTextConfiguration

        config - TwitterTextConfiguration
        Returns:
        TwitterTextParseResults object

      • parseTweetWithoutUrlExtraction

        public static TwitterTextParseResults parseTweetWithoutUrlExtraction(java.lang.String tweet)
        Returns the weighted length of a tweet without doing any URL processing. Used by Twitter Backend to validate the visible tweet in the final step of tweet creation.
        Parameters:
        tweet - which is to be parsed
        Returns:
        TwitterTextParseResults object
